code:
defmodule Solution do
  @spec min_operations(nums1 :: [integer], nums2 :: [integer]) :: integer
  def min_operations(nums1, nums2) do
    swap_if_needed(nums1, nums2, Enum.count(nums1) - 1, 0)
  end

  defp swap_if_needed(nums1, nums2, -1, count), do: count
  defp swap_if_needed(nums1, nums2, index, count) do
    max1 = Enum.max(nums1)
    max2 = Enum.max(nums2)
    elem1 = Enum.at(nums1, index)
    elem2 = Enum.at(nums2, index)

    cond do
      max1 == List.last(nums1) and max2 == List.last(nums2) -> count
      elem1 == max1 and elem2 == max2 -> swap_if_needed(nums1, nums2, index - 1, count)
      true ->
        swapped_nums1 = List.replace_at(nums1, index, elem2)
        swapped_nums2 = List.replace_at(nums2, index, elem1)
        swap_if_needed(swapped_nums1, swapped_nums2, index - 1, count + 1)
    end
  end
end
